message.@eng: Due to system maintenance, the service will be temporarily unavailable. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.

Due to system maintenance, services of AIA Connect will be temporarily suspended from 00:00 to 08:00 and from 18:00 on Sep-16 to 00:00 on Sep-17 (HKT).  Only enquiry functions will be provided from 08:00 to 18:00 on Sep-16.  We apologize for any inconvenience that may cause.

Due to system maintenance, services of AIA Connect will be temporarily suspended from 00:00 to 08:00 and from 18:00 on Oct-16 to 00:00 on Oct-17 (HKT).  Only enquiry functions will be provided from 08:00 to 18:00 on Oct-16.  We apologize for any inconvenience that may cause.
